email.helper: We will send you a magic link to login. Open it in the same device and browser to login.

eula.agreement: By entering this website I accept

name.label: Character Name
name.helper: This will be the name your Character uses in chat.

type.label: Type
type.helper: Is your character a Personal or Fictional? If you are an influencer contact us.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.helper: Select the visibility for your character: Public (visible to everyone), Private (visible only to you), or Unlisted (visible to anyone with the link).

bio.label: Public Bio
bio.helper: How would your Character describe themselves?

avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.helper: This will be the image of your character in the listings

tags.label: Tags
tags.helper: Up to 3 tags can be selected.

creditsPerMessage.label: Credits / Message
creditsPerMessage.helper: How much credits you want to charge your users per chat message? (0 - 100)

requirement.allowed: You can set a price for your character here
requirement.disallowed: You need to be Premium user in oreder to set a price for your character!

greeting.label: Greeting
greeting.helper: What would say to start a conversation?

scenario.label: Scenario
scenario.helper: In what scenario is your character in

exampleConversation.label: Example conversation
exampleConversation.helper: Example conversations and information to define your Character. The first 15-30 messages are the most important. See this guide.

template.label: Character Model
template.helper: Choose between the different character models. They have different behaviors.

creativity.label: Creativity
creativity.helper: Set the creativity (temperature) of your character

personalityText.label: Persona Summary
personalityText.helper: Describe in few sentences what is your character's persona

conversation.disclaimer: Remember: Everything that the character say is made up!
conversation.noFiles: This character has nothing to show currently

messages.document: Let me read a document from {{category.name}}

footer.about: {{appTitle}} powers immersive experiences that feel real, allowing users to generate images and create AI characters.
